plot: A father hires a nanny for his young daughter, who turns out to be an ugly old spinster. The problem is that the nanny has long, beautiful hair, to which the father finds himself strangely attracted.
title: The Politician's Dream
plot_es: A father hires a nanny for his young daughter, who turns out to be an ugly old spinster. The problem is that the nanny has long, beautiful hair, to which the father finds himself strangely attracted.
plot_en: A father hires a nanny for his young daughter, who turns out to be an ugly old spinster. The problem is that the nanny has long, beautiful hair, to which the father finds himself strangely attracted.
